forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 54, with temperatures falling to around 52 in the afternoon. North northwest wind 2 to 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 47. West wind around 6 mph.

weather_report:
Morning dawns softly over Downtown San Francisco, the day greeting us with a gentle mix of sun and lingering coolness. The sky above is mostly clear, yet hints of the iconic fog show themselves across the horizon, just skirting the Golden Gate, suggesting the ever-present marine influence. With today’s high hovering around 54 degrees, the brisk fresh air invites a cozy attire—perhaps a light sweater paired with a jacket for the morning’s cool embrace. 

As the sun climbs higher, temperatures will modestly dip and then hold steady, ideal for a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or a quiet moment in one of the city’s many parks. This time of year, with the fleeting daylight, serves as a charming backdrop for a cup of coffee at a local café, where one might savor the warm drink while people-watching. By evening, the air will cool further, crafting a tranquil setting, perfect for a late walk beneath a sky that gradually gives way to starry skies, punctuated by the fading hues of sunset.
